name: Smoking Thurible
flavorText: The pungent smoke emanating from this censer serves to clear the mind, aiding in concentration and magical castings.
flavorTextHtml: The pungent smoke emanating from this censer serves to clear the mind, aiding in concentration and magical castings.

secondary.textHtml: Equip on Follower: Your follower cannot die.
